title: Octopus Energy Generation invests $1B in ‘cutting-edge’ California clean tech
description: Octopus Energy Generation is investing nearly $1 billion in California's renewable energy sector, backing carbon removal companies and acquiring a solar project.
content: Octopus Energy Generation is investing nearly $1 billion in California's renewable energy sector, backing carbon removal companies and acquiring a solar project.
